metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11521 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
libfreerdp/codec/planar.c in FreeRDP version > 1.0 through 2.0.0-rc4 has an Out-of-bounds Write.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp-x11 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-cache1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-client1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
